description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
full_summary:
# Victoria Class Spare Bracket Strainer Solicitation
### Solicitation Overview
The Department of National Defence is soliciting for the provision of a Basket Strainer, a spare part for the Victoria Class ships, as detailed below.

### Item Requirements
* Item #1, Basket Strainer (GSIN: 4510, NSN: 20-A0Y4428)
* Quantity: 1 unit
* Unit of Issue: to be specified
* To be delivered to the Naval Engineering Test Establishment

### Bidding Requirements
Bidders must provide a clear indication if they are proposing an equivalent or substitute product. If so, please provide the brand name and model or part number, and the National Company Name or Identification Code (NCAGE).

### Tender Documents
The tender documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

### Terms and Conditions
The Crown retains the right to negotiate the procurement with suppliers.

### Procurement Details

| Contract Details | |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | W8482-231127/A |
| Publication Date | June 6, 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date | July 17, 2023, at 14:00:00 (local time) |
| Solicitation Type | Request for Proposal (RFP) |
| Procurement Method | Competitive Bid |
| Selection Criteria | Lowest Price |

### Additional Information

* Please note that the Victoria Class ships are based in British Columbia and Nova Scotia.
* The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* Trade Agreements: CFTA
* Delivery Regions: British Columbia and Nova Scotia
* Expected Contract Start Date: September 15, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 29, 2024

### Contact Information
Cassandra Leach
Contracting Officer
[Email](mailto:Cassandra.Leach@forces.gc.ca)
[Phone](999)999-9999
National Defence Canada
101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada

### Attachments
The solicitation documents are available at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/tender-notice/6084](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/tender-notice/6084) or can be provided upon request. The attachments include:
- Annex A: Casino, Basket Strainer specification sheet
- RFP: Request for Proposal document
- DDP: Delivery, Distribution and
